ssGUI
namespace
ssGUI
ssGUI::​CharacterDetails
struct
ssGUI::​CharacterDetails
Variables
Character
wchar_t Character

The character to be rendered

FontIndex
int FontIndex

The index for the font in the text object to be used

DefaultFontIndex
int DefaultFontIndex

The index for the default font in the text object to be used

FontSize
float FontSize

The font size of the character

CharacterColor
glm::u8vec4 CharacterColor

The color of the character

Underlined
bool Underlined

If the character is underlined or not
